name: src/francy.js
Francy
description:
Francy is the main entry point for the whole framework. By passing an input string/object to the {Francy.handle} function,
Francy will handle the creation of that json as long it is a valid and understandable json object to Francy.
examples:
let francy = new Francy({verbose: true, appendTo: '#div-id', callbackHandler: console.log});
francy.render(json);

name: Options
description: Creates an instance of Francy with the following options:

properties.name: verbose
properties.description: prints extra log information to console.log, default false

properties.name: appendTo
properties.description: where the generated html/svg components will be attached to, default body

properties.name: callbackHandler
properties.description: this handler will be used to invoke actions from the menu, default console.log

properties.name: verbose
properties.description: prints extra log information to console.log, default false

properties.name: appendTo
properties.description: where the generated html/svg components will be attached to, default body

properties.name: callbackHandler
properties.description: this handler will be used to invoke actions from the menu, default console.log

name: render
description: Main entry point. Calling handle passing a json representation string will trigger the drawing of a json object.

src/tracker/change.js
Tracker
description:
This class holds default methods to handle changes on a model object.
It works by the means of a Proxy to track changes and ensures subscribers
are notified of these changes on a time basis (1 second default).

name: constructor
description: Creates a instance of ModelTracker.

params.name: object
params.description: the object object to keep track of changes.

name: _subscribers
description: This is property holds a list of change subscribers.

name: _proxy
description: This is property holds a proxy that handles a dirty flag when object changes.

name: _dirty
description: This is property is used to flag when the object changes.

name: set
description: This method is used by the proxy to set a property when a change occurs, plus it sets the current object to dirty.

name: get
description: This method is used by the proxy to get the object being tracked

name: object
description: Returns the object being tracked

name: subscribe
description: This method is used register a function that is invoked to sync the object

params.name: fn
params.description: the function to execute - must handle one arg, the object, of type {object}

name: unsubscribe
description: This method is used unregister a function registered previously

params.name: fn
params.description: the function to execute - must handle one arg, the object, of type {object}

name: sync
description: This method is used to explicitly sync the module with all the subscribers

name: src/util/id-utils.js
IDUtils
description:
This class generates ids for the html/svg elements in the dom.
The ids naming convention is: 'Francy[Window|Canvas|Object]-*hex uuid*'

name: getWindowId
description: Returns the id for a window based on a canvas id.

name: getCanvasId
description: Returns the id for a canvas based on a canvas id.

name: getObjectId
description: Returns the id for an object based on a object id.

name: getMenuId
description: Returns the id for an object based on a object id.

name: src/util/json-utils.js
JsonUtils
description: This class contains methods to deal with JSON.

name: parse
description: Parses an input nd checks whether this input is valid and returns a JSON object.

unknown.tagValue: {json} - if the input is a valid JSON object, otherwise returns {undefined}

return.description: if the input is a valid JSON object, otherwise returns {undefined}

name: src/util/logger.js
Logger
description: This class is a singleton that provides a logger for the Francy application.

name: constructor
description:
Singleton: Creates an instance of the logger and will returned that instance,
everytime a new instance is requested.

params.name: verbose
params.description: prints extra log information to console.log, default false

name: debug
description: Creates a [DEBUG] entry in the console log

name: info
description: Creates a [INFO] entry in the console log

name: error
description: Creates a [ERROR] entry in the console log

params.name: error
params.description: the error Object to attach to the message

name: warn
description: Creates a [WARN] entry in the console log

params.name: error
params.description: the error Object to attach to the message

name: _format
description: This is a private method that formats all log messages

name: src/util/svg2png.js
